Package com.advertisementproject.userservice.service

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.advertisementproject.userservice.service.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service
public class UserServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserService
Service implementation for doing CRUD operations for users, customers and companies in the database

      Specified by:
      findAllUsers in interface UserService
      Returns:

    • getFullUserInfoById

      public java.lang.Object getFullUserInfoById​(java.util.UUID id)
      Retrieves all info for a customer/company user
      Specified by:
      getFullUserInfoById in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      id - the id for which to retrieve full user information
      Returns:
      full user information including user as well as related customer/company for the supplied user id
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the user is not found for the supplied user id

    • saveCustomerUser

      public CustomerUserResponse saveCustomerUser​(User user, Customer customer)
      Saves a customer user to the database and sends messages to inform other microservices that a user has been created so they can update their databases accordingly.
      Specified by:
      saveCustomerUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      user - the user object to be saved
      customer - the customer object to be saved
      Returns:
      the newly saved customer user

    • saveCompanyUser

      public CompanyUserResponse saveCompanyUser​(User user, Company company)
      Saves a company user to the database and sends messages to inform other microservices that a user has been created as well as that a company has been created so they can update their databases accordingly.
      Specified by:
      saveCompanyUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      user - the user object to be saved
      company - the company object to be saved
      Returns:
      the newly saved company user

      public void validateNotAlreadyRegistered​(java.lang.String email)
      Validates that a customer/company user is not already registered for a supplied email
      Specified by:
      validateNotAlreadyRegistered in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      email - the email to validate is not already registered.
      Throws:
      EmailAlreadyRegisteredException - if the supplied email is already registered.

    • deleteUserById

      public void deleteUserById​(java.util.UUID id)
      Deletes user and related customer/company for the supplied id. Informs other microservices that a user has been deleted and that they should remove information related to that user id.
      Specified by:
      deleteUserById in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      id - the user id for which to delete a customer/company user

    • updateUser

      public java.lang.Object updateUser​(java.util.UUID id, UpdateUserRequest updateUserRequest)
      Updates a customer/company user with the fields supplied in the UpdateUserRequest. Informs other microservices that a user has been updated and that they should update their own user table. If the user is a company user, other microservices are informed that a company has been updated and they should update their own company table.
      Specified by:
      updateUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the customer/company user to be updated
      updateUserRequest - request object including fields that should be updated
      Returns:
      the newly updated customer/company user

    • getCustomerOrCompanyUser

      private java.lang.Object getCustomerOrCompanyUser​(User user)
      Helper method to get a CustomerUserResponse or CompanyUserResponse from a supplied user depending on their role.
      Parameters:
      user - the user for which to get a CustomerUserResponse or CompanyUserResponse
      Returns:
      CustomerUserResponse or CompanyUserResponse depending on the role of the supplied user.

    • updateUserFields

      private void updateUserFields​(UpdateUserRequest updateUserRequest, User user)
      Helper method to update user using the fields that are not null in the supplied UpdateUserRequest
      Parameters:
      updateUserRequest - request object with fields to update the user with.
      user - the user to update

      Specified by:
